pr_title: Issue #7566: Add default config example for AbbreviationAsWordInName

timeline.bodyText: Usually it says To configure the check:
timeline.author: strkkk

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/AbbreviationAsWordInNameCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/AbbreviationAsWordInNameCheck.java index f0d04deab..38276c2d0 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/AbbreviationAsWordInNameCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/AbbreviationAsWordInNameCheck.java @@ -93,7 +93,7 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.CommonUtil; * * *

- * Default Configuration: + * To configure the check: *

* 
  * <module name="AbbreviationAsWordInName"/>

timeline.message: Issue #7566: Add default config example for AbbreviationAsWordInName
Issue #7566: Add default config example for AbbreviationAsWordInName
